mapper.sql: sid, channel_code, channel_name, status, opt_user, opt_date
mapper.insert: insert into pcm_channel (sid, channel_code, channel_name, status, opt_user, opt_date) values (#{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{optUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into pcm_channel
sid,
channel_code,
channel_name,
status,
opt_user,
opt_date,
#{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update pcm_channel
channel_code = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
channel_name = #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
opt_user = #{optUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
opt_date = #{optDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update pcm_channel set channel_code = #{channelCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel_name = #{channelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, opt_user = #{optUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, opt_date = #{optDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where sid = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT pc.sid AS sid, pc.channel_code AS channelCode, pc.channel_name AS channelName FROM pcm_shoppe ps INNER JOIN pcm_channel_sale_config pcsc ON pcsc.shoppe_pro_sid = ps.sid AND pcsc.sale_stauts = 0 INNER JOIN pcm_channel pc ON pcsc.channel_sid = pc.channel_code AND pcsc.sale_stauts = 0 WHERE ps.sid IN ( SELECT ssu.shoppe_sid FROM pcm_shoppe_product ssu WHERE ssu.product_detail_sid IN ( SELECT sku.sid FROM pcm_pro_detail sku WHERE sku.product_sid = ( SELECT spu.sid FROM pcm_product spu WHERE spu.product_sid =
#{spuCode}
0
LIMIT 0, 1 ) ) )
